title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: This course introduces Python programming. Master the basics, including data structures, loops, functions, and object-oriented concepts.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Foundational course exploring algorithm basics. Understand sorting, searching, and basic data structures. Analyze time and space using Big O notation.

title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Comprehensive introduction to C programming. Covers variables, data types, operators, and fundamental control structures. Ideal for beginners.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Utilize C++ to programming. Learn graphics rendering, game loops, memory management, and multiplayer synchronization.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Introductory course on core data structures: arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues. Understand  implementations and real-world applications.

title: Software Engineering
details: Comprehensive overview of the software development process, from requirements development to deployment and maintenance.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master SQL database design. This course covers schema design, normalization, and complex query formulation.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Master AWS services, design scalable systems, and prep for the AWS Solutions Architect certification exam.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Grasp core problem-solving strategies. Learn systematic approaches to break down complex challenges effectively.
